feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 12:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
